publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7000 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to the xx—That the Parliament congratulates the xx on winning the Mercury Prize; notes that its album was described as a record of its time by head judge Simon Firth; recognises the band’s success since its creation in 2005; wishes the band continued success in the future, and notes the importance of the Mercury Prize to the music industry and in promoting new artists. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
